name: Diva Detergent Powder Rose & Lime
description: Diva Fresh Detergent Powder with 3 in 1 action offers a superior clean and a fresh fragrance to clothes. Key Benefits: Long lasting fragrance with “Perfume Magic” technology, “Fiber Clean” technology to attack body oil and sweat on clothes and Optical Brighteners to make clothes look new and fresh. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
